verses.roman:
svarūpa-gosāñi āsi' paṇḍite kahilā
śuni' jagadānanda mane mahā-duḥkha pāilā

synonyms: svarūpa-gosāñi—Svarūpa Dāmodara Gosvāmī; āsi'-returning; paṇḍite kahilā—said to Jagadānanda Paṇḍita; śuni'-hearing; jagadānanda—Jagadānanda Paṇḍita; mane—within the mind; mahā-duḥkha pāilā—felt great unhappiness.
translation: When Svarūpa Dāmodara returned and related all these incidents, Jagadānanda Paṇḍita felt very unhappy.
